name: Coleman PerfectFlow InstaStart Grill Stove
description: Run the best burger stand at basecamp. With a grill on one side and a regular burner on the other, the PerfectFlow Grill Stove lets you barbeque perfect patties while heating side dishes or pots of water.One grill surface and one stove surface let you flex your culinary muscle.Wind Block™ panels keep gusts at bay or act as side tables.840sq. cm of cooking space.Stove area fits 25cm pan.PerfectFlow regulator provides consistent performance in adverse conditions.InstaStart push-button ignitor.Lasts up to 1 hour on a single 1lb canister.Removeable grates, grease tray and cooktop for quick clean up.
